import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux'; import {Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import ProgressBar from "../../components/ProgressBar"; import tours from '../../DB/Tuscany.json'; import { setIncrease,setDescrease,setAdultPrice } from "../../slices/counterSlice"; import { setTours,setTour } from "../../slices/tourSlice"; import UserDetails from '../Purchase/UserDetails'; export default function BookingDetails () { const {id} = useParams(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const allTours = useSelector((state) => state.tour.tours); // Отримуємо з Redux console.log("Тури у Redux:", allTours); const adultCost = useSelector((state) => state.counter.adultCost); const childCost = useSelector((state) => state.counter.childCost); const infantCost = useSelector((state) => state.counter.infantCost); const selectedDay = useSelector((state) => state.tour.setDate); const selectedTime = useSelector((state) => state.tour.setTime); const specificTour = useSelector((state) => state.tour.specificTour); const [value, setValue] = useState(0); const handleChange = (e) =>{ setValue(e.target.value); }; return (
{/* Date*/}

Total Adult Cost: {childCost}

    Infant (0-5)

  • Only in combination with: Adult (18+)
Total Adult Cost: {infantCost}
); } export const TickerOverview = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const specificTour = useSelector((state)=> state.tour.specificTour); console.log(specificTour); const selectedDay = useSelector((state)=> state.tour.setDate); const selectedTime = useSelector((state)=> state.tour.setTime); const adultPrice = useSelector((state)=> state.counter.AdultCost); const childPrice = useSelector((state)=> state.counter.ChildCost); const totalCost = useSelector((state)=> state.counter.TotalCost); return(
